issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment US-203
issue.discussion: Both future and shared_future specify that calling most member functions on an object for which valid() == false produces undefined behavior. There is no such statement for atomic_future.
issue.resolution: Add a new paragraph after 30.6.8 [futures.atomic_future]/2 with the same words as 30.6.7 [futures.shared_future]/3.
